item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello and welcome to my website! My name is Yahia Djemmada, and I’m a lecturer at the National Higher School of Mathematics (NHSM) in Algiers, Algeria. I’ve always been passionate about mathematics and computer sciences, and have pursued this interest through my education and career. I obtained my PhD degree in mathematics at University Of Science And Technology Houari Boumediene (USTHB). In addition to my work as a lecturer, I’m also an active researcher in the fields of combinatorics and discrete mathematics, and have published some papers on these topics.

item.title: Publications
item.description: You can find my full list of publications on Google Scholar. 2025 Partial Deranged Bell Numbers and Their Combinatorial Properties Djemmada, Yahia; Kargın, Levent; Can, Mümün arXiv preprint arXiv:2507.21643 We introduce partial deranged Bell numbers and investigate their combinatorial properties, providing generating functions and recurrence relations. PDF Cite @article{djemmada2025partial, title={Partial Deranged Bell Numbers and Their Combinatorial Properties}, author={Djemmada, Yahia and Karg{\i}n, Levent and Can, M{\&#34;u}m{\&#34;u}n}, journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2507.21643}, year={2025} } 2025 The generalized $r$-Stirling numbers of the first kind Bazeniar, Abdelghfour; Ahmia, Moussa RAIRO - Operations Research We introduce a generalization of the $r$-Stirling numbers of the first kind and their analogues.
